title: 更新forge后不能进地图
author: 冥鑫
txt_content:
我把forge更新到28.0.101的时候进地图总是崩溃然后弹出这个
[04:13:10] [Server thread/ERROR] [minecraft/LootTableManager]: Couldn't parse loot table ceilingtorch:blocks/ilikewood_oak_torch  [04:13:10] [Server thread/ERROR] [minecraft/LootTableManager]: Couldn't parse loot table ceilingtorch:blocks/bonetorch_bonetorch  [04:13:10] [Server thread/ERROR] [minecraft/LootTableManager]: Couldn't parse loot table ceilingtorch:blocks/ilikewood_spruce_torch  [04:13:10] [Server thread/ERROR] [ne.bl.mo.kl.KleeSlabs/]: Slab wood_slab_0 could not be found.  [04:13:10] [Server thread/ERROR] [ne.bl.mo.kl.KleeSlabs/]: Slab wood_slab_1 could not be found.  [04:13:10] [Server thread/ERROR] [ne.bl.mo.kl.KleeSlabs/]: Slab other_slab could not be found.  [04:13:10] [Server thread/WARN] [ne.mi.co.DimensionManager/DIMS]: Missing Dimension Name: 'ultra_amplified_mod:ultraamplified' Id: 4 Type: 'ultra_amplified_mod:ultraamplified  [04:13:15] [Server thread/ERROR] [ne.mi.ev.EventBus/EVENTBUS]: Exception caught during firing event: net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity.getEntityData()Lnet/minecraft/nbt/CompoundNBT;  [04:13:15] [Server thread/ERROR] [minecraft/MinecraftServer]: Encountered an unexpected exception  [04:13:15] [Server thread/ERROR] [minecraft/MinecraftServer]: This crash report has been saved to: D:\MC\MC\.minecraft\versions\1.14.4\crash-reports\crash-2019-09-10_04.13.15-server.txt  [04:13:15] [Client Shutdown Thread/ERROR] [ne.mi.ev.EventBus/EVENTBUS]: Exception caught during firing event: net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity.getEntityData()Lnet/minecraft/nbt/CompoundNBT;  [04:13:15] [Client Shutdown Thread/ERROR] [minecraft/Main]: Caught previously unhandled exception :  AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed


用28.0.100跟28.0.95也是差不多错误报告
我换到28.0.86就报错说缺东西，原本是可以玩的
我把游戏重新安装然后用回28.0.86才没问题
有什么办法可以安装高版本的forge不崩吗？
有些mod新版本现在都需要28.0.93的
我现在用的28.0.86还安不了

replies.author: 冥鑫
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2019-9-10 07:19
D:\MC\MC\.minecraft\versions\1.14.4\crash-reports\crash-2019-09-10_04.13.15-server.txt
上传这个文件 ...
好像跟这个差不多，之前那个整个文件夹被我删掉了，我现在重新安装还是这样







crash-2019-09-10_13.25.02-server.txt


2019-9-10 13:27 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
可能是这个 mod 和高版本的 forge 不兼容所致

【硬核复活】HardcoreRevival_1.14.4-3.0.7.jar （这名字也挺硬核的
